## readEncodedFilterWithDates() function

Reads filter value from encoded string, deserialize date properties into moment

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function readEncodedFilterWithDates<TFilter>(defaultValue: TFilter, filterValue: string, offsetCorrelation?: boolean): TFilter;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defaultValue | TFilter | Default value of filter, which is overriden by values from filterValue |
|  filterValue | string | Encoded string containing filter value |
|  offsetCorrelation | boolean | Indication whether perform timezone offset correlation, defaults to true |

<b>Returns:</b>

TFilter
